title: Track Payer Response Time
description: A manager wants to analyze which insurance companies are the slowest to pay their claims.

tasks.description: Run an 'Aged A/R (Accounts Receivable)' report, summarized by payer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager generates a report showing outstanding balances grouped by insurance company.

tasks.description: Filter the report to show the average days from claim submission to payment for each payer.
tasks.expected_outcome: The report shows the average payment turnaround time for each major payer.

tasks.description: Identify the payer with the highest average days to pay.
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager successfully uses the report to identify a payer that may require focused follow-up from the billing team.
